description: Specification of the geometry for the electrolyser including the discretization parameters and volume fractions

case.description: Type of the geometry. For the moment, there is only one choice 1D. This could be changed in the future.
case.comment: For the moment we only have implemented support of 1D model

widthFractions.description: widths of the different component of in the ionomer membrane. For a 1D model, they will corresponds to a volume fraction

oxygenCatalystSide.description: volume fraction occipied by ionomer on the oxygen electrode side

hydrogenCatalystSide.description: volume fraction occipied by ionomer on the hydrogen electrode side

dim.description: Generic description of the dimension of a component (length and discretization level)

cellsize.description: Size of the finite volume cell

EvolutionElectrode.description: Geometrical characterisation of an evolution electrode, which is given component-wise.

widthFraction.description: volume fraction occupied by the solid part of porous transport layer - outside catalyst layer part. In the catalyst region, the solid part is made of a mix of ionomer and catalyst layer
volume fraction occupied by catalyst layer transport layer
